fields.headline: Tottenham under Hoddle
fields.bodyText: 2001-02 In Hoddle's first full season Spurs reached the the FA Cup sixth round, were beaten 2-1 in the Worthington Cup final by Blackburn and finished ninth in the league 2002-03 Spurs finished 10th, having been knocked out of the Worthington Cup by Burnley and humilated in the FA Cup by Southampton
